main_definition: Contracts refer to legally binding agreements between two or more parties that outline the terms, conditions, and obligations of each party involved.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A written agreement with specific terms and conditions
meanings_and_examples.example: The construction company signed a contract to build John's new house by July 1st.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To decrease in size or amount, often due to a formal agreement
meanings_and_examples.example: After signing the contract with the supplier, our inventory levels will contract significantly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An infectious disease caused by viruses that can cause inflammation and damage to organs
meanings_and_examples.example: The flu is a common viral infection that causes contracts of the respiratory system, resulting in fever and body aches.
